name: Dynamic Core Workouts
description: Engaging multiple muscle groups through explosive core exercises.

cards.title: Hanging Leg Raises for Lower Ab Strength
cards.description: Building lower abdominal and hip flexor strength through controlled leg raises.
bulletpoints: Keep legs straight and avoid swinging
Control both the upward and downward phases
Modify by bending knees if necessary
cards.summaryText: Lift and lower legs under control to scorch lower abs without swinging.

cards.title: Medicine Ball Slams for Power and Core Activation
cards.description: Developing explosive core strength with full-body engagement.
bulletpoints: Engage the core to generate maximum force
Use a non-bouncing medicine ball for better resistance
Focus on speed and power while maintaining control
cards.summaryText: Drive the ball into the floor with explosive core power each rep.
